LanguageData.BM_SpacerPowerKickCombatModule.label: power kick module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerPowerKickCombatModule.descripti: A high-tech combat-oriented device that can be installed into any compatible artificial leg replacement. This particular model is equipped with a set of armor-like plates around the foot and knee area along with miniaturized power-thrusters that can be fully retracted outside of combat, allowing the wielder to carry it around comfortably with no interference during daily tasks.
